definition: a line that marks the outer limits of an object or figure : boundary
examples: the jagged outline of the mountains
the sharpening outline of her face

definition: a style of drawing in which contours are marked without shading

examples: prepared several outlines of the suggested mural

definition: a condensed treatment of a particular subject
a summary of a written work : synopsis
examples: Students were required to give an outline for each assigned paper.

definition: a preliminary account of a project : plan
examples: gave the class an outline of the points he intended to cover

definition: a fishing line set out overnight
to indicate the principal features or different parts of
